shared.model.states

Interface IState

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DiscardState, FirstRoundState, PlayingState, RobbingState, RollingState, SecondRoundState, TradingState, WaitingState

    public interface IState
    Interface to the state classes in accordance with the state pattern
    Author:
    Joshua Reynolds

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void finishPhase(TurnTracker turn_tracker_pointer, int player_index)
      Advances to the next state in the turn
      void forceDiscard(TurnTracker turn_tracker_pointer, int player_index)
      Forces this player into the Discarding State
      TurnStatus getState()
      Gets the state

    • Method Detail

      • getState

        TurnStatus getState()
        Gets the state
        Pre-Conditions
        none
        Post-Conditions
        returns the state as defined in the shared definitions

      • finishPhase

        void finishPhase(TurnTracker turn_tracker_pointer,
               int player_index)
        Advances to the next state in the turn
        Pre-Conditions
        the player is finished with all required actions in this state
        Post-Conditions
        the state is advanced to the next state

      • forceDiscard

        void forceDiscard(TurnTracker turn_tracker_pointer,
                int player_index)
                  throws java.lang.Exception
        Forces this player into the Discarding State
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
        Pre-Conditions
        the player is in the Waiting or Rolling State
        Post-Conditions
        the player is in the Discarding state
